scenes.background: [Monica] adjusts her glasses while [Bob] leans back in his chair, arms crossed.
scenes.description: 'Alright, I can walk us through the main points. But we need to decide on a strategy moving forward.'

options.text: Maybe we should outline our main objectives first and then dive into details.
options.analysis: You suggested a structured approach to the discussion, showing good perception and self-regulation, though it could be more emotionally engaging.

options.text: I agree. Monica, can you start with the critical points?
options.analysis: You supported Monica taking the lead, demonstrating empathy and social skills, though the overall perception of the problem might need more depth.

options.text: I think we should take a step back and have a dedicated meeting for this.
options.analysis: You proposed postponing the discussion for a more focused meeting, showing good social skill but lower empathy and immediate motivation.
